name: Mecha Battles
description:
MECHA BATTLES

A top-down retro style robot game. 
Explore the world and find robots at Dark Forests which you can control and use to defeat other guarding robots. 
(Hint: Look for caves if you are struggling to obtain enough resources for crafting)

Game controls can be found in the options screen from the main menu.
The game works best in edge or Firefox but can be played with any browse

*This is my first 'completed' game that I have released so it may not be of the best standards*

My Youtube channel: UE4 Poseidon
